alert.note: Alert for Northern Valley and Northern Phillips Counties; Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties; The Little Rockies; The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 18 at 1:52PM MDT until October 20 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: .Fire Weather Conditions Possible on Thursday. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND GUSTY WIND FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 134, 135, 136, AND 137... The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Thursday morning through Thursday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 134, 135, 136, and 137. * WIND...From the west-northwest at 20 to 25 mph and gusts in excess of 35 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will spread rapidly toward the east-southeast. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Fire Weather Watch.

area.areaDesc: Northern Valley and Northern Phillips Counties; Southern Petroleum and Southern Garfield Counties; The Little Rockies; The Lower Missouri River Breaks including the Charles M Russell National Wildlife Refuge
